assignedUser: You have been assigned to start a review
reviewProgress: The review you are assigned to has progressed
crossCheckingSubmit: The review you are assigned to has been sent for cross-checking
reviewSubmit: The review you are assigned to has been sent for review
crossChecker: You have been selected as a cross-checker
reviewer: You have been selected as a reviewer
reviewRejected: The review you are assigned to has been rejected, make the necessary changes for it to be accepted
